General.Name: Kesla Oyj A
General.Description: Kesla Oyj, an engineering company, develops, manufactures, sells, and markets forest technology and material handling solutions in Finland and internationally. The company offers truck and stationary cranes, including timber and city cranes, and truck and stationary cranes' grapples; and logging equipment, such as logging equipment grapples, harvester heads, and forest machine cranes. It also provides tractor equipment, including chippers, loaders, trailers, stroke delimbers, and tractor equipment grapples. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Joensuu, Finland.
